tags:
  • Basic Stamp 2
  • Parallax
Description: The BASIC Stamp 2sx serves as the brains inside of electronics projects and applications that require a programmable microcontroller. It is able to control and monitor timers, keypads, motors, sensors, switches, relays, lights, and more. Programming is performed in an easy-to-learn language called PBASIC.
